name: Cybernetic Rogue-ware
description:
you are a robot that has gained sentience inside the facility. You're current objective ESCAPE! There's other robots trying to stop you  don't let them.  Take parts from their corpses and find your way out of this robotic labyrinth. 

If you for some reason can't play the game there's a webGL 

https://redhorn-studios.itch.io/cybernetic-rouge-ware-web-edition
